title: Does a Leaked Video Reveal a Government Plot to Vaccinate Against ‘Thoughts, Ideas, and Religion?’
subtitle: The FunVax rumor largely hinges on the "God gene" theory, a bit of pop science that doesn't quite stand up to peer reviewed scrutiny.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A leaked Pentagon video reveals a government plot to vaccinate people against thoughts, ideas, and religion.
